tier.item: (6) a. Sürü- ü donü o. Nganasan

tier.item: The master has a daughter. His daughter is very pretty. (Teres enko 1979: 95)
b. Ba:rb u xonty koptua. Nganasan
The master has a daughter. His daughter is very pretty. (Teres enko 1979: 95)
